name: Storm the Dungeon
description:
hi!! this is my big project for my game dev class in high school, some people said they wanted to have a copy and i said "ill put it on itch.io lmao"

this is the version i submitted but its not a full game (it wasnt supposed to be a full game btw dw), if this somehow gets popular ill make a full version

there might be bugs idk lmk if there are lmao

(yes ik the title is HORRIBLE plz dont bully me lmao)

CONTROLS:

wasd for movement, e and q to select UI buttons when theyre there and space to press UI buttons

also press escape to quit (or use the quit button if u die lmao)

CREDIT:

leon chang for the music (https://open.spotify.com/album/0lCdZMrwTdjblf6eU77z5I?si=aygkwW9XTra-18NVqBGb2w)

0x72 for the tileset (16x16 DungeonTileset II by 0x72 (itch.io))

undertale for the inspiration ig (i dont think i need a link to undertale at this point)
